body.name: Safety 1st Everslim DLX All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, 4 Modes of use: Rear-Facing, Forward-Facing (22Ð65 lbs), Belt-Positioning Booster (40Ð100 lbs), Backless Booster (40Ð100 lbs), High Street
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 23 mins
features: GROWS WITH YOUR CHILD 4 modes of use fit children birth to age 10: rear-facing (5–40 lbs., 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs., 29"–49"), belt-positioning booster and backless booster (40–100 lbs., 43"–52"). Converts to backless booster with one hand.
FITS 3 ACROSS IN STANDARD BACK SEATS This convertible car seat’s slim design allows parents to comfortably fit more in the back seat without sacrificing comfort.
VISUAL INDICATOR ON THE CHEST CLIP The red-to-green indicator on the SecureTech chest clip visually shows parents if the chest clip is buckled or not.
ADJUSTABLE BASE AND HEADREST The EverSlim All-in-One Convertible Car Seat features a 5-position adjustable base and a 10-position adjustable headrest for maximum comfort and safety.
EASILY CLEAN UP SPILLS AND MESSES Removable seat cover and infant inserts are machine washable and dryer safe.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES YOU’LL LOVE Includes 2 removable dishwasher-safe cup holders—one with a BPA-free snack lid, an easily removable backless booster, and a harness that adjusts without rethreading. The seat cushion is made of comfy, memory foam.
body.description: The Safety 1st EverSlim All-in-One Convertible Car Seat is built to grow with your child while keeping them secure and comfortable on the road. With 4 modes of use— rear-facing (5–40 lbs., 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs., 29"–49"), belt-positioning booster and backless booster (40–100 lbs., 43"–52")—the Safety 1st EverSlim is ready to take your baby home from the hospital or take your big kid to soccer practice. The red-to-green indicator on the SecureTech™ chest clip visually shows parents if the chest clip is buckled or not. The seat’s slim design allows for fitting 3 across the back seat in most vehicles without sacrificing comfort. With a 5-position adjustable base, a 1-hand 10-position adjustable headrest, an easy-to-convert backless booster, and machine washable and dryable fabric, it’s the only car seat your child will need, from birth through age 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and safe
reviews.reviewText: I finally got my baby a new car seat and we love it. The price was great and the seat itself is comfortable and looks durable .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car seat is worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Daughter lives to sit in this car seat! It is super padded and fits perfectly in our car. Not to mention it is a beautiful design and looks even better in person. Very elegant look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is the perfect width for my small compact car. It still allows two full grown adults to sit in the backseat when it's placed in the middle or even two booster seats on either side.Con: the shoulder straps seem to be placed far apart. They're secure enough that I have no doubt they will keep him in place, but I do wish they had a more narrow placement. Also, in furthest rear facing reclined position, my son's head falls forward when sleeping (maybe all convertible carseats are this way?)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and comfy
reviews.reviewText: My baby outgrew infant car seat at 7 months he hated it. Purchased this one to replace and he loves it ! And big boy fits perfect !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my now 1 year old who did not like being in a car seat. She has not cried since we put her in this. Super comfy, grows with your child, easy to put together. All around great product and worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Offers amazing fit and comfort
reviews.reviewText: We got this seat for our grandson and he fits comfortably and snug. The locking mechanism is great, the red and green indicators are extremely helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat that we have ever owned
reviews.reviewText: I have had 8 car seats in my life time and this one is the absolute easiest and best one I have had! It is super easy to adjust the sizes and the only one my baby doesn’t cry when sitting in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Make sure your seat is completely flat
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice and seems to be decent quality. However, it does not work for newborns unless your seat is completely flat. It does not recline enough for angled back seats so be aware of that before buying. I have an Audi s4 and wife has a new Hyundai Sonata and it won’t work in either one of our cars. Other than that, it’s a nice seat. Just have to buy another seat before I can use this one.
